title: Skidboot the Amazing Dog
description: Meet Skidboot, the Amazing Dog. His owner swears he never trained the blue heeler to do tricks. Skidboot just does what he is told to do. And what he does has amazed not only thousands at rodeos and fairs, but millions as well, through television appearances on The Tonight Show with Jay Leno, The Late Show with David Letterman, and many others. This is the story of a dog who almost got kicked off the ranch, but ended up a star.
author: Ron Westmoreland
